Text: Warning everyone, this is not "Jack the Giant Slayer", notice this one's named "killer" instead of slayer. I cant believe all these producers trying to trick people nowadays in this way... imagine the poor people who actually pays for a movie like this and thinks hes paying for the good one hes seen on trailers =/

For background and a list of other Asylum Studios movies to avoid. These guys are the real pirates. We just steal - they butcher.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Asylum

is it shitty that they make such atrocious movies? sure. do people who pay money to buy/rent them right as they're hitting theaters deserve what they get? fuck yes they do! I might have a tiny shred of sympathy for people who waste $ renting them at redbox AFTER the real movies have also been released on dvd, but even then it doesn't take a genius to puzzle out that these are knock offs. a fool and his money...
